popjava.buffer
Class Buffer

java.lang.Object
  popjava.buffer.Buffer
Direct Known Subclasses:
BufferPlugin, BufferRaw
public abstract class Buffer
extends java.lang.Object

This abstract class defined all the required methods to implement a buffer. The buffer is responsible to encode and decode the data before sending them or receiving them over the network.
